entry.value: # This example relies on ggplot2, and grid, if these packages are not part of %%00010# your R installation, please add them!%%00010require(ggplot2)%%00010require(grid)%%00010%%00010# define a plot theme%%00010# http://docs.ggplot2.org/0.9.2.1/theme.html for more options%%00010clean_theme = theme(panel.background = element_blank(),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009plot.title = element_text(size=22, face="bold", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", linetype = "solid", fill = "transparent"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.title.x = element_text(size=20, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.title.y = element_text(size=20, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.text = element_text(size=14, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.text.x = element_text(size=18, face="italic", colour = "black", angle = 25),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009legend.text = element_text(size=18, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009legend.title = element_text(size=18, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009panel.grid = element_blank()%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009)%%00010%%00010%%00010labels = labs(list(%%00009title = knime.flow.in[["title"]], %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009x = "Position + Type",%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009fill = "Interacting"%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009)%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009)%%00010%%00010# abbreviate interaction types%%00010knime.in[,"shorttype"] <- "HBA"%%00010knime.in[which(as.character(knime.in$"Interaction Type")=="Hydrogen bond donor (protein)"),"shorttype"] <- "HBD"%%00010%%00010# combined position + type%%00010knime.in["KLIFS_type"] <- as.factor(apply(knime.in[,c("KLIFS position","shorttype")], 1, function(x){paste(x,collapse="_")}))%%00010knime.in$"Interaction" <- as.factor(knime.in$"Interaction present")%%00010%%00010# generate plot %%00010plot <- ggplot(knime.in, aes(`KLIFS_type`, fill=`Interaction`)) + geom_bar()%%00010plot + clean_theme + labels

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
